title: Authorizes James Freitag, a retiree,  to apply for retroactive membership in the New York state teachers' retirement system
summary: Authorizes James Freitag, a retiree, to apply for retroactive membership in the New York state teachers' retirement system, and to have his retirement benefits adjusted accordingly.
actClause: AN ACT to authorize James Freitag, a retiree receiving benefits from the New York state teachers' retirement system, to apply for retroactive membership in such retirement system
